channel.title: Data Engineering on Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on Digital Garden

item.title: Building a Low-Code/No-Code Data Engineering Framework: A First-Hand Experience - Part I
item.description: Let’s dive into the world of Low-Code/No Code Data Engineering. But before we do, let’s set the stage with a bit of context on the Data Engineering Process. Traditional data engineering is a complex and intricate process. It involves creating and maintaining architectures, databases, and processing systems that deal with vast amounts of data. Think of Data Engineers as the architects of data. They build pipelines that transform and transport data into a format that can be used by data scientists.
